Date.description: Date when the receipt was issued

Contact.description: Information about the contact associated with the receipt

LineItems.description: List of line items on the receipt

LineAmountTypes.description: Type of amount values used in the line items

TotalTax.description: Total tax amount on the receipt

Total.description: Total amount including taxes and discounts

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Date and time when the receipt was last updated

HasAttachments.description: Flag indicating if there are any attachments linked to the receipt

Url.description: URL to access the receipt online

ValidationErrors.description: List of validation errors, if any

Attachments.description: Details of any attachments linked to the receipt
